casebody.data:
Bernard M. SHOTKIN, Trustee, etc., v. The MOUNTAIN STATES TELEPHONE AND TELEGRAPH COMPANY, etc., et al. No. 3835. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. April 22, 1949. Bernard M. Shotkin, pro se. Brock, Akolt & Campbell, John R. Tum-quist and Gerald E. Welsh, Denver, Colo., for appellees.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and BRATTON and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed April 22, 1949, for failure to prosecute.
